item.description: Led by performance faculty pianist Nando Michelin and featuring Jerry Bergonzi, one of the greatest tenor saxophonists of our time, the Nando Michelin Group performs original jazz compositions with a South American rhythmic influence. The event is free and open to the public with no ticket required.Â  (Note: please RSVP separately for the Jumbo Happy Hour preceding this event.)
item.name: Tufts Music Concert: Parallel Realities
